Package com.cafean.jobstream.common.components

Class PlatformDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cafean.jobstream.common.components.PlatformDefinition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<PlatformDefinition>
    public class PlatformDefinition
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<PlatformDefinition>, java.io.Serializable
    The in-memory representation of a target platform definition specified in a site configuration file. It is held in memory by Stream Plugin as a lookup for selecting a target platform and Job Status to display the available platforms and tracking servers.
    See Also:
    ApplicationDefinition, Serialized Form

      • getLocation

        public java.lang.String getLocation()
        Returns the location of this platform as defined in a site configuration file. This string is interpreted differently by each PlatformModule and may be as simple as a file path or as complex as a full URI with user information.

      • setLocation

        public void setLocation​(java.lang.String location)
        Sets the location of this platform as defined in a site configuration file. This string is interpreted differently by each PlatformModule and may be as simple as a file path or as complex as a full URI with user information.

      • getOption

        public java.lang.String getOption​(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the value specified for the given option in site configuration.

      • getOption

        public java.lang.String getOption​(java.lang.String name,
                                  java.lang.String defaultValue)
        Returns the value specified for the given option in site configuration.
        Parameters:
        name - a String containing the name of the option
        defaultValue - a String containing the value returned if the option is not set
        Returns:
        a String containing the value set for the option or the default if the value is not set.

        public boolean getBoolOption​(java.lang.String name,
                             boolean defaultValue)
        Returns the value specified for the given option in site configuration as a boolean value.
        Parameters:

        defaultValue - a String containing the value returned if the option is not set
        Returns:
        the value set for the option or the default if the value is not set.

      • getPlatformName

        public java.lang.String getPlatformName()
        Returns the user-specified name of this platform definition. This is part of the string displayed to the user when selecting a target platform in the form [site name]-[platform name].

      • setPlatformName

        public void setPlatformName​(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the user-specified name of this platform definition. This is part of the string displayed to the user when selecting a target platform in the form [site name]-[platform name].

      • getSiteName

        public java.lang.String getSiteName()
        Returns the user-specified name of the site containing this platform definition. This is part of the string displayed to the user when selecting a target platform in the form [site name]-[platform name].

      • setSiteName

        public void setSiteName​(java.lang.String site)
        Sets the user-specified name of the site containing this platform definition. This is part of the string displayed to the user when selecting a target platform in the form [site name]-[platform name].

      • getPlatformID

        public java.lang.String getPlatformID()
        Returns the ID used to reference this platform definition from objects such as PlatformProperties.
        Returns:
        a String containing this definition's platform ID in the form [site name]-[platform name]
        See Also:
        StreamPlugin.findPlatform(String)

      • getPlatformPath

        public java.lang.String getPlatformPath()
        Returns this definition's "path" which is comprised of the name of the group that contains it (if any) followed by its name. Platforms defined in the user's "Personal Settings" have an empty group and thus use only their name for their path. Platforms in the Global site configuration use a path of the form [Group]/[Platform].
        Returns:
        a String containing this definition's path

      • getPlatformID

        public static java.lang.String getPlatformID​(java.lang.String siteName,
                                             java.lang.String platformName)
        Returns an appropriately formatted platform ID for the given site name and platform name.
        Parameters:
        siteName - a String containing the name of the site
        platformName - a String containing the name of the platform
        Returns:
        a String containing the platform ID in the form [site name]-[platform name]

      • getType

        public java.lang.String getType()
        Returns the type of this platform.
        See Also:

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo​(PlatformDefinition o)
        Returns a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this platform is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified platform. Compares this platform to the given platform based first on group, then platform ID.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<PlatformDefinition>
